question: Flipkart recently signed an MoU with which stateâ€™s Handloom and Handicrafts Development Corporation for promotion of local handicrafts?
explanation:
e-commerce major Flipkart said it has signed a Memorandum of Understanding with Gujarat state Handloom and Handicrafts Development Corporation (GSHHDC) for promotion of local handicrafts.
The pact is part of the Samarth initiative of Flipkart, which aims at assisting local artisans, weavers and craftsmen to access the global market and establish their business on the Flipkart Marketplace. Under the recent agreement, eligible sellers of the state will receive training and incubation support from Flipkart in many fields including business insights, dedicated seller support and warehousing.
